title: Handle Unclaimed Property (Escheatment)
description: A life insurance policy's death benefit was never claimed, and the funds must be turned over to the state as unclaimed property.

tasks.description: Identify policies where the insured is deceased but no claim has been filed after a significant period.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system identifies a policy where the death benefit remains unpaid for over 5 years.

tasks.description: Perform a final due diligence search for any beneficiaries.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent performs a search but is unable to locate any living beneficiaries.

tasks.description: Process the escheatment of the funds to the appropriate state's unclaimed property division.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully transfers the funds to the state and closes the file.
